messages.subject: Re: SAHM adjustments
messages.msgSnippet: I have to make that time - though I find a little bit of time to myself goes a long way!  It doesn t occur to my dh to come home and say - you ve been with
messages.messageBody:
I have to make that time - though I find a little bit of time to myself
goes a long way! It doesn't occur to my dh to come home and say -
"you've been with the kids all day, why don't I give you a break". But
he is a dear and always says yes when I tell him I need time for myself.
I also make sure to spend time with MY friends. I invite them over or
invite myself to their house or we see each other at homeschool
functions.
Mary Ellen
One can never have too many buttons.
Laurella Lederer

>> Are you able to schedule any self time for your own needs and does
your DH help you to >>just take that time when he gets home?
